item.description:
Hello Newcomers!
This Thursday night come on over to my apartment for a cozy pot luck dinner! When you RSVP please list what dish you plan to bring. Cook (or buy, if cooking isn't your thing!) enough food for around 5 people. Any type of food is good to bring - appetizers, salad, chips, bread, drinks, main dishes, dessert, etc.
When you get to Halsey Street you can park on the street on the opposite side of our building. If you get lost, or just need to get in touch with me, call our house at (401) 369-8382.
See you there!
Marissa
item.name: Pot Luck at Marissa and Phil's Place
